title: NewsBreak: China Euphoria Pushes S&P 500 to Highest Level in Month
text:
NewsBreak: China Euphoria Pushes S&P 500 to Highest Level in Month

Stock Markets 17 hours ago (Sep 05, 2019 15:09)

© Reuters. Investing.com - Stocks were holding onto big gains Thursday afternoon and looked to close at their highest levels in a month as euphoria about a resumption of trade talks between the United States and China swept Wall Street. The numbers at 3:05 PM ET (19:05 GMT): The was up 1.4%. The were up 1.6%, and the had added 1.75%. Chip stocks, technology stocks generally, and bank stocks were the strongest groups. The weakest were utilities, real estate and consumer staples stocks as investors sought shares with more risk. The rally comes a day before the Labor Department's August jobs report, due Friday before the market open. Interest rates were higher, as the yield rose to 1.567% from Wednesday's 1.459%.

NewsBreak: China Euphoria Pushes S&P 500 to Highest Level in Month
description: NewsBreak: China Euphoria Pushes S&P 500 to Highest Level in Month
